text: George Burnet Budge (1884 - 1962), was a Scottish international lawn bowler. ==Bowls career== He won a bronze medal in the pairs at the 1954 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Vancouver, with John Carswell. ==Personal life== He was a company director by trade and lived in Dalry, North Ayrshire. ==References== Category:1884 births Category:1962 deaths Category:Bowls players at the 1954 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for Scotland Category:Scottish male bowls players
title: George Budge
